commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Reinhart almost had one early! That shot rang off the crossbar; Skinner was definitely beat there.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Yeah, that was a close call. The Panthers are showing they're ready to keep the pressure on, not content to sit on that one-goal lead.
